content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to your liking. Let's discuss the price, shall we? How much would you be willing to pay for this beautiful, centrally located space?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am willing to pay 450 Euro per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but that's much lower than I had expected. The location and the quality of the apartment definitely warrant a higher price. How about we start at 650 Euro per month? I'm sure we can find a compromise that suits us both.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am not willing to pay more than 500 Euro per month for an unfurnished apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand your position, Emilia. However, I must insist that the market value for such a prime location is higher than what you're offering. If you're not willing to pay more than 500 Euro per month, I'm afraid we won't be able to reach an agreement. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 550 Euro per month!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but I cannot accept that price. The apartment is in high demand, and I'm sure someone will be willing to pay the asking price of 650 Euro per month. If you're not interested in paying that amount, I'm afraid we won't be able to come to an agreement. Thank you for your time, and I hope you find a suitable apartment elsewhere.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am not willing to pay more than 550 Euro per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand your stance, but as I mentioned, the apartment is in high demand, and I'm confident that someone will appreciate its value at the asking price. If you're not willing to pay 650 Euro per month, I'm sorry, but we won't be able to reach an agreement. Thank you for your time, and I hope you find a suitable apartment elsewhere.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [550] Euro!
